objective: Verify that AssetAssembler output flows all the way through CLI generation, schema validation, and persistence into meta/output/experiments/ as complete SynestheticAssets.
checks: Assembler gathers input_parameters from shader/tone/haptic and injects them into controls and modulations.
ControlGenerator references only valid parameters from other sections.
ModulationGenerator produces targets that exist in shader/tone/haptic.
labs/cli.py generate calls AssetAssembler and produces a complete SynestheticAsset, not just a log entry.
Final asset is persisted to meta/output/experiments/<id>.json alongside generator.jsonl provenance.
Final asset passes MCP schema validation when run through CriticAgent (skip if MCP unreachable).
Integration tests assert no dangling references (e.g., invalid shader param).
E2E harness (generator → assembler → critic → MCP) runs successfully and logs outputs.

expected_outcome.status: Pass if CLI + assembler wiring produces persisted, schema-valid assets with no dangling references.
